citation.title: to be published

notes.text: This potential is a modification of the <a href="./Download/Mg-Mendelev-2015/Mg1.eam.fs">Mg1.eam.fs</a> potential. This potential was developed to study the effects of the latent heat and the liquid structure on the SLI free energy.
These files were sent by M.I. Mendelev (Ames Laboratory) on 7 Dec. 2015 and posted with his permission.
